com.szollosi.scorestatistics.data

Interface DataManaging

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SharedPreferenceDataManager

    public interface DataManaging
    Data managing interface.

    • Method Detail

      • getScoreByTeam

        @Nullable
Score getScoreByTeam(@NonNull
                               java.lang.String teamName)
        Gets the saved scored for a team.
        Parameters:
        teamName - The team to get saved score.
        Returns:
        The saved score of a team or null if the team does not exist in the Shared Preference

      • getTeams

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getTeams()
        Gets all teams from the Shared Preference.
        Returns:
        A list with the team names.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Resets the Shared Preference, a.k.a remove any elements from it.

      • saveScore

        void saveScore(@NonNull
               java.lang.String teamA,
               @NonNull
               java.lang.String teamB,
               int scoreA,
               int scoreB)
        Saves the newly entered match score into the Shared Preference.
        Parameters:
        teamA - The first team in the score board
        teamB - The second team in the score board
        scoreA - The number of scored goals of the first team
        scoreB - The number of scored goals of the second team

      • saveTeamName

        boolean saveTeamName(@NonNull
                     java.lang.String teamName)
        Saves the newly entered team name into the Shared Preference.
        Parameters:
        teamName - The name to save
        Returns:
        true if the name is saved, false in case of any errors during the saving operation
